name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Developer Engineer with 10+ years of experience in **Software Development**, delivering high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Adept in **Project Management**, I excel in **Time Management** and **Asynchronous Work**, effectively balancing multiple projects to meet deadlines. Proven problem-solving capabilities ensure the successful resolution of complex challenges throughout development cycles.

Skilled in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise across the full stack using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proficient in building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**. Experienced in leading the development of enterprise platforms embedding AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics, automation, and intelligent decision-making. Solid understanding of **microservices architecture**, **event-driven systems**, and **CI/CD automation**, with a focus on building secure, maintainable solutions that comply with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

Brings practical experience in **MLOps**—developing ML pipelines, deploying models, and managing production workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about creating systems that drive real-world impact while being technically sound.
